basics.name: Iana Atanassova
basics.title: Full Professor in Natural Language Processing
basics.summary:
Director of the CRIT laboratory at the Universit Marie et Louis Pasteur, France.
Member of Institut Universitaire de France (IUF).

work.name: Université Marie et Louis Pasteur (formerly Université de Franche-Comté), France
work.position: Full Professor in Natural Language Processing
work.summary: Full Professor and Director of Centre de Recherches Interdisciplinaires et Transculturelles (CRIT) in Besançon, France. Research in NLP specializing in scientific discourse analysis, uncertainty modeling, information extraction.
highlights: Supervision of doctoral and postdoctoral researchers
Course manager of the MSc degree in NLP

work.name: Institut Universitaire de France (IUF)
work.summary: Junior member involved in interdisciplinary research funded by IUF, with emphasis on Natural Language Processing and scientific knowledge modeling.

work.name: Université de Franche-Comté, France
work.position: Assistant Professor in Natural Language Processing
work.summary: Teaching and research in NLP, including computational linguistics courses.

work.name: MyScienceWork
work.summary: Implemented search engine for scientific papers for a social network specializing in scholarly communication.

work.name: Concordia University, Montréal, Canada
work.summary: Semantic processing of corpora in humanities and social sciences.

awards.title: IUF (Institut Universitaire de France) Research Grant, Junior Member
awards.summary: Support for interdisciplinary research in Natural Language Processing.

awards.title: First Prize of the InovHackTion Hackathon
awards.summary: Award for intelligent analysis of documents.

projects.name: InSciM - Modelling Uncertainty in Science
projects.summary: ANR JCJC funded research project addressing linguistic modeling of scientific uncertainty. French ANR grant number ANR-21-CE38-0003-01.

projects.name: Automatic correction of text responses to exams
projects.summary: Collaboration and technology transfer to the start-up e-Cole, funded by Technopole de la Réunion.

projects.summary: Project for documentary fund exploitation, funded by Région Bourgogne Franche-Comté.

Private partners : ERDIL (France), Global Data Excellence (Switzerland)
